doc_string.value:
@notice Accept a transfer of ownership
    @return bool success

@notice Accept a transfer of ownership
    @return bool success

@title Meta Burner
@notice Converts Metapool-paired coins to 3MOBI and transfers to fee distributor

params._emergency_owner: Emergency owner address. Can kill the contract and recover tokens.
params._owner: Owner address. Can kill the contract, recover tokens and modify the recovery address.
params._receiver: Address that converted tokens are transferred to. Should be set to an `UnderlyingBurner` deployment.
params._recovery: Address that tokens are transferred to during an emergency token recovery.

burn(address).notice: Swap `_coin` for 3MOBI and transfer to the fee distributor

params._coin: Address of the coin being swapped

commit_transfer_emergency_ownership(addr.details: Must be accepted by the new owner via `accept_transfer_ownership`

commit_transfer_ownership(address).details: Must be accepted by the new owner via `accept_transfer_ownership`

recover_balance(address).details: Tokens are sent to the recovery address
recover_balance(address).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens from this contract

set_killed(bool).details: When killed, the `burn` function cannot be called
set_killed(bool).notice: Set killed status for this contract

natspec.notice: Converts Metapool-paired coins to 3MOBI and transfers to fee distributor
natspec.title: Meta Burner
